Title: Prohibits the production, sale and use of adhesive-based rodent traps
Summary: Prohibits the importation, manufacture, sale, distribution and use of glue traps, glue boards, and other adhesive-based animal traps.
LawCode: Add ยง399-tt, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the production, sale and use of adhesive-based animal traps
